item.title: Who am I?
item.description: I’m a Computer Programming student passionate about Penetration Testing, Web Application Security, and hands-on cybersecurity challenges. I develop with Python, JavaScript, and Go, and enhance my skills through Capture the Flag (CTF) challenges. As an active member of my university’s Free Software and Open Source community, I help organize events and promote open-source culture. I aim to deepen my expertise in Penetration Testing, Malware Analysis, System and Network Administration to become a well-rounded cybersecurity professional.
